verses.verse: And <WG2532> as he <WG846> went <WG1607> <WG5740> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG2411>, one <WG1520> of his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, see <WG2396> what manner <WG4217> of stones <WG3037> and <WG2532> what <WG4217> buildings <WG3619> are here !

For <WG1063> many <WG4183> shall come <WG2064> <WG5695> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG5748> Moshiach; and <WG2532> shall deceive <WG4105> <WG5692> many <WG4183>.

And <WG1161> when <WG3752> ye shall hear <WG191> <WG5661> of wars <WG4171> and <WG2532> rumours <WG189> of wars <WG4171>, be ye <WG2360> not <WG3361> troubled <WG2360> <WG5744>: for <WG1063> such things must <WG1163> <WG5748> needs be <WG1096> <WG5635>; but <WG235> the end <WG5056> shall not be yet <WG3768>.

For <WG1063> nation <WG1484> shall rise <WG1453> <WG5701> against <WG1909> nation <WG1484>, and <WG2532> kingdom <WG932> against <WG1909> kingdom <WG932>: and <WG2532> there shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> earthquakes <WG4578> in divers <WG2596> places <WG5117>, and <WG2532> there shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> famines <WG3042> and <WG2532> troubles <WG5016>: these <WG5023> are the beginnings <WG746> of sorrows <WG5604>.

But <WG1161> take heed <WG5210> <WG991> <WG5720> to yourselves <WG1438>: for <WG1063> they shall deliver <WG3860> you <WG5209> up <WG3860> <WG5692> to <WG1519> councils <WG4892>; and <WG2532> in <WG1519> the synagogues <WG4864> ye shall be beaten <WG1194> <WG5691>: and <WG2532> ye shall be brought <WG2476> <WG5701> <WG5625> <WG71> <WG5701> before <WG1909> rulers <WG2232> and <WG2532> kings <WG935> for my <WG1700> sake <WG1752>, for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> against them <WG846>.
And <WG2532> the gospel <WG2098> must <WG1163> <WG5748> first <WG4412> be published <WG2784> <WG5683> among <WG1519> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484>.

And <WG2532> ye shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> hated <WG3404> <WG5746> of <WG5259> all <WG3956> men for <WG1223> my <WG3450> name's sake <WG1223> <WG3686>: but <WG1161> he that shall endure <WG5278> <WG5660> unto <WG1519> the end <WG5056>, the same <WG3778> shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>.

But <WG1161> when <WG3752> ye shall see <WG1492> <WG5632> the abomination <WG946> of desolation <WG2050>, spoken <WG4483> <WG5685> of by <WG5259> Daniel <WG1158> the prophet <WG4396>, standing <WG2476> <WG5756> <WG5625> <WG2476> <WG5761> where <WG3699> it ought <WG1163> <WG5748> not <WG3756>, (let him that readeth <WG314> <WG5723> understand <WG3539> <WG5720>,) then <WG5119> let them <WG5343> that be in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449> flee <WG5343> <WG5720> to <WG1519> the mountains <WG3735>:

And <WG2532> let <WG1994> him that is <WG5607> <WG5752> in <WG1519> the field <WG68> not <WG3361> turn <WG1519> <WG1994> back <WG3694> again <WG1994> <WG5657> for to take up <WG142> <WG5658> his <WG846> garment <WG2440>.
But <WG1161> woe <WG3759> to them that are <WG2192> <WG5723> with <WG1722> child <WG1064>, and <WG2532> to them that give suck <WG2337> <WG5723> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>!
And <WG1161> pray ye <WG4336> <WG5737> that <WG3363> your <WG5216> flight <WG5437> be <WG1096> <WG5638> not <WG3363> in the winter <WG5494>.

For <WG1063> in those <WG1565> days <WG2250> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> affliction <WG2347>, such <WG5108> as <WG3634> was <WG1096> <WG5754> not <WG3756> from <WG575> the beginning <WG746> of the creation <WG2937> which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> created <WG2936> <WG5656> unto <WG2193> this time <WG3568>, neither <WG2532> <WG3364> shall be <WG1096> <WG5638>.

And <WG2532> except <WG1508> that the YY <WG2962> had shortened <WG2856> <WG5656> those days <WG2250>, no <WG3756> <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> should be <WG302> saved <WG4982> <WG5681>: but <WG235> for <WG1223> the elect's sake <WG1588>, whom <WG3739> he hath chosen <WG1586> <WG5668>, he hath shortened <WG2856> <WG5656> the days <WG2250>.

And <WG2532> then <WG5119> if <WG1437> any man <WG5100> shall say <WG2036> <WG5632> to you <WG5213>, Lo <WG2400> <WG5628>, here <WG5602> is Moshiach <WG5547>; or <WG2228>, lo <WG2400> <WG5628>, he is there <WG1563>; believe <WG4100> <WG5661> him not <WG3361>:

For <WG1063> false Moshiachs <WG5580> and <WG2532> false prophets <WG5578> shall rise <WG1453> <WG5701>, and <WG2532> shall shew <WG1325> <WG5692> signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059>, to <WG4314> seduce <WG635> <WG5721>, if <WG1487> it were possible <WG1415>, even <WG2532> the elect <WG1588>.
But <WG1161> take <WG991> ye <WG5210> heed <WG991> <WG5720>: behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I have foretold <WG4280> <WG5758> you <WG5213> all things <WG3956>.

But <WG235> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>, after <WG3326> that <WG1565> tribulation <WG2347>, the sun <WG2246> shall be darkened <WG4654> <WG5701>, and <WG2532> the moon <WG4582> shall <WG1325> not <WG3756> give <WG1325> <WG5692> her <WG846> light <WG5338>,

And <WG2532> the stars <WG792> of heaven <WG3772> shall <WG2071> <WG5704> fall <WG1601> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> the powers <WG1411> that are in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> shall be shaken <WG4531> <WG5701>.

And <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall he send <WG649> <WG5692> his <WG846> angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> shall gather together <WG1996> <WG5692> his <WG846> elect <WG1588> from <WG1537> the four <WG5064> winds <WG417>, from <WG575> the uttermost part <WG206> of the earth <WG1093> to <WG2193> the uttermost part <WG206> of heaven <WG3772>.

Now <WG1161> learn <WG3129> <WG5628> a parable <WG3850> of <WG575> the fig tree <WG4808>; When <WG3752> her <WG846> branch <WG2798> is <WG1096> <WG5638> yet <WG2235> tender <WG527>, and <WG2532> putteth forth <WG1631> <WG5725> leaves <WG5444>, ye know <WG1097> <WG5719> that <WG3754> summer <WG2330> is <WG2076> <WG5748> near <WG1451>:

So <WG3779> ye <WG5210> in like manner <WG2532>, when <WG3752> ye shall see <WG1492> <WG5632> these things <WG5023> come to pass <WG1096> <WG5740>, know <WG1097> <WG5720> that <WG3754> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> nigh <WG1451>, even at <WG1909> the doors <WG2374>.

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> this <WG3778> generation <WG1074> shall <WG3928> not <WG3364> pass <WG3928> <WG5632>, till <WG3360> <WG3739> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023> be done <WG1096> <WG5638>.
Heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093> shall pass away <WG3928> <WG5695>: but <WG1161> my <WG3450> words <WG3056> shall <WG3928> not <WG3364> pass away <WG3928> <WG5632>.

But <WG1161> of <WG4012> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> and <WG2532> that hour <WG5610> knoweth <WG1492> <WG5758> no man <WG3762>, no, not <WG3761> the angels <WG32> which <WG3588> are in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, neither <WG3761> the Son <WG5207>, but <WG1508> the Father <WG3962>.
Take ye heed <WG991> <WG5720>, watch <WG69> <WG5720> and <WG2532> pray <WG4336> <WG5737>: for <WG1063> ye know <WG1492> <WG5758> not <WG3756> when <WG4219> the time <WG2540> is <WG2076> <WG5748>.

For the Son of man is as <WG5613> a man <WG444> taking a far journey <WG590>, who left <WG863> <WG5631> his <WG846> house <WG3614>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> <WG5631> authority <WG1849> to his <WG846> servants <WG1401>, and <WG2532> to every man <WG1538> his <WG846> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> commanded <WG1781> <WG5662> the porter <WG2377> to <WG2443> watch <WG1127> <WG5725>.

Watch ye <WG1127> <WG5720> therefore <WG3767>: for <WG1063> ye know <WG1492> <WG5758> not <WG3756> when <WG4219> the master <WG2962> of the house <WG3614> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736>, at even <WG3796>, or <WG2228> at midnight <WG3317>, or <WG2228> at the cockcrowing <WG219>, or <WG2228> in the morning <WG4404>:

And <WG1161> what <WG3739> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto all <WG3956>, Watch <WG1127> <WG5720>.
